5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed ‘Eid at the prayer place, using a small spear as a Sutrah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحَرْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning carrying a spear on the day of ‘Eid
